name: Drone x
description:
Player is a drone and the obstacles are aliens.

Some mission generated number are displayed on the player.

With respective to the code some random numbers are displayed on the alien characters

We have to make the player’s number to zero by firing the obstacles by using the numbers on the them

Incase the obstacle touches the player the game will end.
